alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gulf and south central Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, southwestern Liberty and north central Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 357 PM EDT/257 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles east of Stonemill Creek, or 21 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Chipola Cutoff, Central City, Red Hill, Owens Bridge, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Kern, Wilma, Lewis, Sumatra, Nixon Garden and Twin Pole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
